plot: Hanzo, the honored Samurai of the Tsushima clan, is favoured as the next Daimyo. Takashi, the son of the Daimyo attempts to overthrow his father.
title: Dead Samurai
plot_es: Hanzo, the honored Samurai of the Tsushima clan, is favoured as the next Daimyo. Takashi, the son of the Daimyo attempts to overthrow his father.
plot_en: Hanzo, the honored Samurai of the Tsushima clan, is favoured as the next Daimyo. Takashi, the son of the Daimyo attempts to overthrow his father.
